title: Dragon Ball Bandai Dragon Stars Figures Superhero Goku Superhero Goku Action Figure | 17cm Articulated Figure | Bandai Dragon Stars Anime Figures | Anime Gifts And Anime Merch
features: DETAILED GOKU FIGURE | Have fun playing with this authentic anime figurine depicting Goku from the Dragon Ball manga and anime series. Enjoy these toys for boys, girls and fans of all ages from Bandai's Dragon Stars range of Dragon Ball figures.
SUPERHERO GOKU | Goku is one of the main anime heroes from the Dragon Ball Super manga and anime series. This Goku toy shows him in his normal form.

FULLY ARTICULATED ACTION FIGURE | This 17cm Goku anime figure has 17 points of articulation making it endlessly posable. Relive your favourite moments from the Dragon Ball Super anime and manga series like Goku's fight with Golden Frieza with these flexible action figures.

ANIME TOY WITH ACCESSORIES | Each of the Dragon Ball toys in this range comes with an additional set of hands or accessories for even more fun. These anime action figures are suitable for play or display making them perfect toys for kids and adults, or brilliant Dragon Ball gifts for any anime fan.

OVER 50 TO COLLECT | Goku is not alone! You can collect over 50 of your favourite anime characters as part of the Dragon Stars range of Bandai figures. Fight them out to determine the champion of your anime toys or display them alone or with other Dragon Ball merchandise.
description: From the brand Previous page For collectors and fans alike, Bandai has a perfect range of Dragon Ball figures as well as playsets, and wearable role play items. Inspired by the beloved Dragon Ball Super anime series and films, these toys come in different sizes and with different levels of articulation but all share their high quality and attention to detail. The 12.5cm tall action figures in the Dragon Ball Evolve range are free-standing and have over 15 points of articulation. Depicting both heroes and villains, each character is lovingly recreated from the anime series. Dragon Ball Dragon Stars Dragon Stars is the largest range of Dragon Ball action figures from Bandai. Each toy is 17cm tall and has 17 points of articulation. The Dragon Ball Flash Series contains authentic 10cm figures with 3 points of articulation. Each figure comes with a collectable coin that serves as an excellent base to display your figure as part of a Dragon Ball collection. Dragon Ball Chibi Masters These Chibi Masters anime figures are expertly crafted and intricately detailed. They are non-articulated and stand on a display base. The giant, 30cm action figures in the Limit Breaker range truly make an impact in any Dragon Ball merchandise collection. Use their 5 points of articulation to battle them together until you name a champion! Tenkaichi Budokai Playset The Tenkaichi Budokai playset has 3 interactable damage features and is compatible with the Dragon Stars action figures range. Next page
